name: XBOT-MD
description: Javascript WhatsApp bot made by DavidX

MODE.description: Select your bot work type: public, private, inbox, or group.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make it true for automatic status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Make it true for automatic status reaction or like.

ANTI_LINK.description: Make it true if you want the bot to auto-remove group links.
